Uses of Class
kopper.tetris.core.Coord

  • Packages that use Coord 
    Package Description
    kopper.tetris.core
    This package contains all the classes that render parts of the Tetris game screen.
    kopper.tetris.shape
    This package contains all classes of that implement the Tetromino Shapes required for a this module's implementation of a Tetris game.

    • Uses of Coord in kopper.tetris.core

      Fields in kopper.tetris.core declared as Coord 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      (package private) Coord[] TetrominoStats.coords  
      private Coord[] StartPauseScreen.itemCenters
      This array holds all of the x, y coordinatesof the centers of the text messages to be printed to the screen, which is preferred to individual Coord objects to make a quick for loop for processing possible.
      private Coord TetrisGame.spawnCoord
      The spawn location of a new shape is set to the horizontal center and one cell over the top of the game screen.
      Methods in kopper.tetris.core that return Coord 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Coord Coord.add​(int x, int y)
      Adds this coordinates's x and y values to the specified coordinate's x and y values and returns a newly instantiated coordinate with x and y values being the sum result.
      Coord Coord.add​(Coord c)
      Adds this coordinates to the specified coordinate and returns a newly instantiated resultant.
      Methods in kopper.tetris.core with parameters of type Coord 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Coord Coord.add​(Coord c)
      Adds this coordinates to the specified coordinate and returns a newly instantiated resultant.
      static Shape BackgroundGrid.getNextShape​(Coord coord)
      Returns a Shape of one of equal chance of being one of the following six subclass of Shape: ShapeI, ShapeJ, ShapeL, ShapeO, ShapeS, ShapeT, ShapeZ.
      void Coord.translate​(Coord c)
      Translates the coordinate point represented by this object by adding the specified x and y values of the specified coordinate to it.

      Methods in kopper.tetris.shape that return Coord 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Coord[] Shape.cloneCoords​(Coord[] coords)
      Creates a new Coord array with each object an exact duplicate of the corresponding object in the supplied Coord array.
      Coord Shape.getAbsoluteCellPos​(int cellNum)
      This method adds the cell center returned by Shape.getAbsoluteShapePos() to each of this cell's relative coordinates.
      Coord Shape.getAbsoluteShapePos()
      Returns this shape's absolute position, which is always the axis of rotation and typically the center cell of the Shape's numerous cells.
      abstract Coord Shape.getRelativeCellPos​(int cellNum)
      Returns the relative coordinate for the cell in question.
